sqlMap.insert:
select SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET_SEQ.nextval from DUAL
insert into SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET (TARGET_ID, NAME, MEMO, B_CERTIFICATE, FAX_NO, FAX_TEMPLATE,SUPPLIER_ID ,FAX_STRATEGY, CREATE_TIME,VALID,ORG_IDï¼ŒFAX_FLAG,DIMENSION_FLAG,SUPPLIER_FLAG, SHOW_SETTLE_PRICE_FLAG,MANUAL_FAX_FLAG,SUPPLIER_FORBID_SALE_FALG,EBK_PROD_AUDIT_CFG) values ( #targetId#, #name#,#memo#,#bcertificate#, #faxNo#, #faxTemplate#,#supplierId# , #faxStrategy#, sysdate,'Y',#orgId#,#faxFlag#,#dimensionFlag#,#supplierFlag#, #showSettlePriceFlag#,#manualFaxFlag#,#supplierForbidSaleFalg#,#ebkProdAuditCfg#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.*, ROWNUM AS ROWNUM1 FROM ( select * from SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET where VALID='Y'
order by TARGET_ID desc ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #_endRow# ) WHERE ROWNUM1 >=#_startRow#

select SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET.*,SUP_SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_NAME from SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET,SUP_SUPPLIER where SUP_SUPPLIER.SUPPLIER_ID=SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET.SUPPLIER_ID and TARGET_ID = #targetId# and SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET.VALID='Y'
sqlMap.update: update SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET set NAME = #name#, MEMO = #memo#, B_CERTIFICATE = #bcertificate#, FAX_NO = #faxNo#, FAX_TEMPLATE = #faxTemplate#, FAX_STRATEGY = #faxStrategy#, FAX_FLAG=#faxFlag#, DIMENSION_FLAG=#dimensionFlag#, SUPPLIER_FLAG=#supplierFlag#, SHOW_SETTLE_PRICE_FLAG=#showSettlePriceFlag#, MANUAL_FAX_FLAG=#manualFaxFlag#, SUPPLIER_FORBID_SALE_FALG=#supplierForbidSaleFalg#, PRICE_STOCK_VERIFY_FALG=#priceStockVerifyFalg#, EBK_PROD_AUDIT_CFG=#ebkProdAuditCfg# where TARGET_ID = #targetId#
update SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET set VALID='N' where TARGET_ID = #targetId#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select * from SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET where VALID='Y'
order by TARGET_ID desc ) where rownum <51
select t.* from META_B_CERTIFICATE c, SUP_B_CERTIFICATE_TARGET t where t.TARGET_ID=c.TARGET_ID and c.META_PRODUCT_ID=#metaProductId# and c.biz_type=#bizType# and t.VALID='Y'
